scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd ../website && npm install --include=dev && npm run build && cd ../backend && rm -rf ./public && mkdir -p ./public && cp -a ../frontend/build/. ./public/ && rm -rf ./website-build && mkdir -p ./website-build && cp -a ../website/dist/. ./website-build/
